plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: O contrasinal debe ter, polo menos, %d letras
O contrasinal debe conter polo menos 1 letra

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: O contrasinal debe ter, polo menos, %d letras minúsculas
O contrasinal debe ter, polo menos, 1 letras minúsculas

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: O contrasinal debe conter, polo menos, %d letras maiúsculas
O contrasinal debe conter, polo menos, 1 letras maiúsculas

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: O contrasinal debe ter, polo menos, %d díxitos
O contrasinal debe ter, polo menos, 1 díxitos

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: O contrasinal debe conter, polo menos, %d símbolos especiais
O contrasinal debe conter, polo menos, 1 símbolos especiais

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: O contrasinal debe conter, polo menos, %d carácteres non alfabéticos
O contrasinal debe conter, polo menos, 1 carácteres non alfabéticos
